name: Toon All Star Slam
description:
- Welcome to the ultimate cartoon crossover! -
Play as your favorite childhood cartoon characters and fight until you can't fight anymore in this up to 8 player local platform fighter built off of blistering speed and utter chaos!

Play as either...

Dexter -  The boy genius zoner glass cannon character!
Spongebob - The ready for anything all round character! 
Mickey - The utility packed combo stance character!
and Grim - The heavy hitting stage control character !

Play on 9 different stages ranging from Invader Zim's home base, to Doofensmirtz Evil inc, to even Steamboat Willy!
...and of course, Shattered Gateway, featuring over 60 different cameo characters across tons of different shows and films!

Keep an eye out for constant balance changes and new features and content over time!

This is a nonprofit fangame made by fans out of love and passion!

All rights go to their respective owners!
